history.proof: intros x y. scongruence use: succ_predZ, succ_addZ_r, pred_succZ.

exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet + is not finished.
Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros x y. unfold addZ, predZ. destruct x as [|nx|nnx] eqn:Hx. - simpl. reflexivity. - destruct nx as [|nx']; simpl. + unfold addpos. simpl. rewrite tech_pred_posZ; auto. + unfold addpos. rewrite tech_add_pos_succZ. reflexivity. - destruct nnx as [|nnx']; simpl. + unfold addneg. simpl. rewrite tech_add_neg_predZ. auto. + unfold addneg. simpl. rewrite addZ_eq5, <- tech_add_neg_predZ, <- addZ_eq5. auto.
